description.zh-cn: 中国第一本详细论述建筑工程做法的官方著作，由北宋将作监李诫于元符三年（1100年）编成，崇宁二年（1103年）颁发施行。该书对后世建筑形制、工程装修及施工管理等方面产生了深远影响。
description.en: The first official treatise in China detailing architectural methods, compiled by Li Jie of the Directorate for Palace Buildings in the Northern Song dynasty in 1100 and promulgated in 1103. The book had a profound influence on later architectural forms, engineering decoration, and construction management.

description.zh-cn: 北宋建筑师，曾任将作监少监，奉命编著了《营造法式》。
description.en: A Northern Song dynasty architect who served as the Vice Director of the Directorate for Palace Buildings and was ordered to compile the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代。《营造法式》是在该时期编纂并作为官方标准颁行的。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history. The 'Yingzao Fashi' was compiled and issued as an official standard during this period.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑史学家，对《营造法式》进行了深入研究和注解。
description.en: A Chinese architectural historian who conducted in-depth research and annotation of the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代掌管宫室、宗庙、城郭等土木建筑工程的机构，李诫曾在此任职。
description.en: An ancient Chinese government agency in charge of civil engineering and construction projects such as palaces, temples, and city walls, where Li Jie once served.

description.zh-cn: 《营造法式》的前身，于元祐六年（1091年）编成，后因未规定模数制而被李诫重新编著。
description.en: The predecessor to 'Yingzao Fashi', compiled in 1091. It was later re-compiled by Li Jie because it did not specify a modular system.

description.zh-cn: 南宋平江府官员，秦桧的妻弟。他在绍兴十五年（1145年）重刊了《营造法式》，对该书的流传有重要贡献。
description.en: An official of Pingjiang Prefecture in the Southern Song dynasty and the brother-in-law of Qin Hui. He republished the 'Yingzao Fashi' in 1145, making a significant contribution to its transmission.

description.zh-cn: 南宋宰相，其妻弟王唤重刊了《营造法式》。
description.en: A chancellor of the Southern Song dynasty whose brother-in-law, Wang Huan, republished the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 宋代地方行政机构，治所在今苏州。其提举王唤曾重刊《营造法式》。
description.en: A local administrative body during the Song dynasty, with its seat in modern-day Suzhou. Its official Wang Huan republished the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 清代编修的大型丛书，收录了《营造法式》，是其流传的重要版本之一。
description.en: A large collection of books compiled during the Qing dynasty, which includes the 'Yingzao Fashi', making it one of the important extant versions.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代学者，发现了《营造法式》的重要抄本，并推动了其现代出版和研究，是中国营造学社的创办人。
description.en: A modern Chinese scholar who discovered an important manuscript of the 'Yingzao Fashi', promoted its modern publication and research, and was the founder of the Society for the Study of Chinese Architecture.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名藏书家、刻书家，于1925年刊印了精美的仿宋陶湘本《营造法式》。
description.en: A famous modern Chinese bibliophile and publisher who printed the exquisite facsimile Song edition of 'Yingzao Fashi' in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代古建筑学家，中国营造学社文献部主任，受朱启钤委托对《营造法式》进行校对，并参与校勘陶湘本。
description.en: A modern Chinese architectural historian and the director of the documentation department of the Society for the Study of Chinese Architecture. He was commissioned by Zhu Qiqian to collate the 'Yingzao Fashi' and participated in the proofreading of Tao Xiang's edition.

en: Society for the Study of Chinese Architecture

description.zh-cn: 研究中国古代建筑的学术团体，对《营造法式》进行了深入研究。
description.en: An academic society for the research of ancient Chinese architecture, which conducted in-depth studies on the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 陶湘之弟，中国营造学社成员，参与了陶湘本《营造法式》的校勘工作。
description.en: The younger brother of Tao Xiang and a member of the Society for the Study of Chinese Architecture. He participated in the proofreading of Tao Xiang's edition of 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官方于乾隆十二年（1734年）颁布的建筑工程规范，其“斗口制”代替了《营造法式》中的“材份制”。
description.en: An architectural engineering standard promulgated by the Qing government in 1734. Its 'doukou' modular system replaced the 'cai-fen' system from the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 清朝掌管全国工程事务的中央机构，曾颁布《清工部工程做法则例》。
description.en: The central government agency of the Qing dynasty in charge of national engineering affairs, which promulgated the 'Qing Ministry of Works Engineering Practices'.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名出版机构，于1920年首次发行《营造法式》抄本的影印本，后多次重版。
description.en: A famous Chinese publishing house that first issued a photolithographic copy of a 'Yingzao Fashi' manuscript in 1920 and subsequently reprinted it multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 《营造法式》是论述中国古代建筑工程做法的官方著作。
description.en: 'Yingzao Fashi' is an official treatise on ancient Chinese architectural engineering practices.

description.zh-cn: 李诫奉命编著了《营造法式》。
description.en: Li Jie was ordered to compile the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 北宋朝廷于崇宁二年（1103年）将《营造法式》作为官方标准颁发施行。
description.en: The Northern Song imperial court issued and implemented 'Yingzao Fashi' as the official standard in 1103.

description.zh-cn: 李诫在编著《营造法式》时担任将作监少监。
description.en: Li Jie served as the Vice Director of the Directorate for Palace Buildings when he compiled the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 《营造法式》是在《元祐法式》的基础上重新编著的，后者因未规定模数制而被取代。
description.en: 'Yingzao Fashi' was re-compiled based on 'Yuanyou Fashi', which was replaced for lacking a modular system.

description.zh-cn: 王唤于绍兴十五年（1145年）在平江府重刊《营造法式》，后世版本多来源于此，对该书的流传贡献巨大。
description.en: Wang Huan republished the 'Yingzao Fashi' in Pingjiang Prefecture in 1145. Later editions are mostly derived from this version, making a great contribution to the book's transmission.

description.zh-cn: 王唤是秦桧的妻弟。
description.en: Wang Huan was the younger brother of Qin Hui's wife.

description.zh-cn: 王唤时任平江府提举。
description.en: Wang Huan served as the Supervisor of Pingjiang Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 朱启钤于1919年发现了《营造法式》的重要抄本，并推动了其在现代的出版与研究。
description.en: In 1919, Zhu Qiqian discovered an important manuscript of 'Yingzao Fashi' and promoted its modern publication and research.

description.zh-cn: 陶湘于1925年整理校勘并刻板刊行了仿宋本《营造法式》，世称“陶湘本”，对该书的传播和研究影响深远。
description.en: In 1925, Tao Xiang collated, proofread, and published a facsimile Song edition of 'Yingzao Fashi', known as the 'Tao Xiang edition', which had a profound impact on the book's dissemination and study.

description.zh-cn: 阚铎曾任中国营造学社第一任文献部主任。
description.en: Kan Duo served as the first Director of the Documentation Department of the Society for the Study of Chinese Architecture.

description.zh-cn: 陶洙是中国营造学社的成员。
description.en: Tao Zhu was a member of the Society for the Study of Chinese Architecture.

description.zh-cn: 1930年，阚铎受朱启钤委托，将陶湘本《营造法式》与其它版本进行校对。
description.en: In 1930, Kan Duo was commissioned by Zhu Qiqian to collate Tao Xiang's edition of 'Yingzao Fashi' with other versions.

description.zh-cn: 陶洙是陶湘的弟弟。
description.en: Tao Zhu was the younger brother of Tao Xiang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝于1734年颁布的《清工部工程做法则例》中的“斗口制”代替了《营造法式》中以“材”为模数的做法。
description.en: The 'doukou' system in the 'Qing Ministry of Works Engineering Practices', promulgated in 1734, replaced the 'cai' modular system of the 'Yingzao Fashi'.

description.zh-cn: 清工部于乾隆十二年（1734年）颁布了《清工部工程做法则例》。
description.en: The Qing Ministry of Works promulgated the 'Qing Ministry of Works Engineering Practices' in 1734.

description.zh-cn: 商务印书馆于1920年发行了《营造法式》丁丙八千楼抄本的影印本，并在此后多次重版。
description.en: In 1920, The Commercial Press published a photolithographic copy of the Ding Bing Baqianlou manuscript of 'Yingzao Fashi', and subsequently reprinted it multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 《四库全书》收录了《营造法式》，是其得以流传至今的重要载体。
description.en: The 'Siku Quanshu' included the 'Yingzao Fashi', serving as an important vehicle for its transmission to the present day.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成对《营造法式》进行了系统的注解和研究，其成果《营造法式注释》是该领域的重要学术著作。
description.en: Liang Sicheng systematically annotated and researched 'Yingzao Fashi'. His work, 'Annotations on Yingzao Fashi', is a significant academic achievement in the field.
